Class Client

java.rmi.server.RemoteObject

java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAskNotify, ClientHandler, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIClient, SocketClient

      Description copied from interface: ClientHandler
      method called by the server to restore the status of a game in a client after a break or a disconnection

      restoreSession in interface ClientHandler
      Parameters:
      board - : game board
      myShelf - : user shelf
      otherShelf - : other shelf
      myScore - : user score
      gameID - : game ID
      pgcNum - : personal goal card number
      pgcMap - : map representing the personal goal card tile's disposition
      cgc1num - : first common goal card number
      cgc2num - : second common goal card number
